alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 2:21PM MST until March 06 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...In Montana, Bighorn Canyon, Red Lodge Foothills, and Southern Big Horn. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to the snow and poor visibility. This includes the evening commute. Young livestock may be at risk from the cold and wet conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet or slushy roads will freeze quickly in the late afternoon and early evening. Be prepared for slick conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Big Horn
